abstract: While it may be tempting to ignore value at risk altogether because it has proved of little worth when times get tough, that might be mistake. Value-at risk-measurements play a crucial role in setting capital.
snippet: While it may be tempting to ignore value at risk altogether because it has proved of little worth when times get tough, that might be mistake. Value-at risk-measurements play a crucial role in setting capital.
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley reported upbeat third-quarter earnings on Thursday. But its numbers provide a lesson in why it’s sometimes necessary to journey down rabbit holes to understand complex Wall Street firms.

headline.main: When Wall Street Firms Change Risk Models
